text:
Catalytic converters is one of
the most important technologies

for pollution that has been
invented in over the last 50

It's changed the game in terms
of what comes out of that car.

It wouldn't work,
you wouldn't get rid

of these things,
these toxic things,

you wouldn't get rid of
them unless you ran it

at 1,000 degrees and you're not
doing that underneath your car

But if you put the
right catalyst in,

all of those reactions to get
rid of those toxic chemicals

can happen much more
quickly and efficiently.
